PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^7Build and PoB made by Ruetoo: https://www.twitch.tv/ruetoo Guide by Ventrua (---link to youtube---) Levelling run by Ventrua: https://youtu.be/mzXO3JZVSt4 ^7 ^xE05030^xD02090^xB97123^xD02090^xAF6025^xE05030^xD02090PoB has multiple setups, make sure to switch skill sets, gear sets and skill tree when looking at each setup^7^7^7. ^7^xAF6025 ^7-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Levelling gems and comments
Start by muling Ranger for^7 ^x70FF70Momentum ^7- this way you get extra vendor check and a few wisdoms
Regex to check vendors: b-b-r|b-[br]-b|r-b-b|nne (show BBB and BBR and 10% ms boots, if you want to see something else make your own regex at poe.re)
Act 1 (skill set Level 1-12) ^xADAA47^x7070FF^xC8C8C8^7^xADAA47^x7070FFRolling Magma ^7^x7070FF^7+^7 ^x7070FFElemental Proliferation^7 + ^x7070FFCombustion^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem War Banner^7 ^xE05030Leap Slam^7 + ^x70FF70Momentum^7
Goat's Horn (level 6 wand) is the best weapon for a long time and you should get 2 of those To be able to Leap Slam, you need to weapon swap, If you don't care about losing a few minutes, you can delay leaping until level 24 (won't need to weapon swap there) Regardless whether you will weapon swap for leap or not, look for an axe AND sword (they HAVE TO BE DIFFERENT for dual weild mastery to work, mace potentially works) with 1.45 attack speed or higher with decent colors (I recommended at least R-G link on one weapon and second weapon with at least 1 blue and 1 green socket)
Act 2-3 until level 28 (skill set Level 12-27) ^x7070FFRolling Magma^7 ^7^x7070FF^7+^7 ^x7070FFElemental Proliferation^7 + ^x7070FFCombustion^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 ^x7070FFFlame Wall Flammability ^xE05030Herald of Ash ^7-> ^xE05030Anger^7 at 24 ^xE05030War Banner^7^7 ^xE05030Leap Slam^7^7 + ^x70FF70Momentum^7 ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7 ^x7070FFHerald of Thunder^7 (optional) ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 (optional, can drop if no sockets)
Different possible aura setups for the rest of this run 1) Anger + War Banner if you are actually going to use Banner 2) Anger + Herald of Ash 3) Anger + Herald of Ash + War Banner (hard mana management, more socket pressure, only experienced players should use this)
^xD02090IMPORTANT: Solaris 2 has fire damage craft in the room after Diala - 4 transmutes cost for each weapon, craft on both weapons as soon as you can^7
Act 3 - Armageddon Brand/Cremation swap (skill set Level 28-40) ^x7070FFArmageddon Brand^7^7 ^7^x7070FF^7+^7 ^x7070FFElemental Proliferation^7 + ^x7070FFCombustion^7 + (^xE05030Cruelty^7) ^x70FF70Cremation ^7+ ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 + 1-2 gems of ^x7070FFConcetrated Effect^7 / ^xE05030Cruelty^7 / ^x70FF70Lesser Multiple Projectiles^7 ^x70FF70^x7070FFFrostblink^7 ^x70FF70Desecrate^7^7 ^xE05030Anger Herald of Ash^7 and/or ^xE05030War Banner^7 ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 ^xADAA47^x7070FFFlammability^7^x7070FF ^xE05030Leap Slam^7^7^7 + ^x70FF70Momentum^7 ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7^7
Normal lab: Sanctuary
Act 6 until CoC swap (skill set Level 41-Swap) ^x7070FFArmageddon Brand^7^7 ^7^x7070FF^7+^7 ^x7070FFIgnite Proliferation^7 + ^x7070FFCombustion^7 + ^xE05030Cruelty^7^7 ^x70FF70Cremation ^7+ ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 + ^x7070FFImmolate^7 + 1 of ^x7070FFConcetrated Effect^7 / ^xE05030Cruelty^7 / ^x70FF70Greater Multiple Projectiles^7 ^x70FF70^x7070FFFrostblink^7 ^x70FF70Desecrate^7^7 ^xE05030Anger Herald of Ash^7 and/or ^xE05030War Banner^7 ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 ^xADAA47^x7070FFFlammability^7^x7070FF ^xE05030Leap Slam^7^7^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks ^7+^7 (^x70FF70Momentum^7^7 optional) ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7^7 ^x70FF70Blood Rage^7 (optional)
^xD02090Level gems in weapon swap: Increased Critical Strikes, Cast on Critical Strike, Grace, Determination, Assassin's Mark, Mark on Hit^7
Cruel Lab: Pious Path Merciless Lab: Righteous Providence
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CoC swap (skill set CoC Swap)
DON'T SWAP UNTIL YOU HAVE ALL OF THE FOLLOWING:
Lancing Steel of Spraying (20 quality) Detonate of Chain Reaction 5 link (ideally ES/EV, aim to have at least 150+ ES on it, otherwise the ES sustain can be rough) Diamond flask with "chance to gain Flask Charge when you deal a critical strike" Weapon with %increased critical strike chance and %increased attack speed on a decent sword base - you are looking for 7.5% crit or higher and 1.6 attack speed or higher Assassin's Mark (20 quality) Desecrate level 15+
You will have to farm Merciless (3rd lab) for quite a while so get ready for it - you care about these crafting options
Transform a Skill Gem to be a random Transfigured Gem of the same colour (most common craft, use any green gem) Add +#% quality to a Gem until your Assassin's Mark and Lancing Steel of Spraying are 20% quality - only use when you get +10% or +15% option Transform a non-Transfigured Skill Gem to be a random Transfigured version (guaranteed Lancing Lancing Steel of Spraying if you use Lancing Steel, 50% chance to get Detonate Dead of Chain Reaction if you use Detonate Dead, have the gems ready on you or in stash)
Before you actually start playing CoC - you have to get a Raise spectre gem and go Desecrate in Cathedral Rooftop (act 10) and raise a Kitava Herald
^xD02090Your Desecrate MUST BE BEFORE Detonate Dead in your CoC links^7
^x70FF70Lancing Steel of Spraying ^7+ ^x70FF70Cast on Critical Strike^7 + ^x70FF70Desecrate ^7+ ^x70FF70Detonate Dead of Chain Reaction ^7+^7 ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Strikes^7 + (^xADAA47^x7070FFI^7^x7070FFn^x7070FFcreased Critical Damage^7 if 6l) ^xE05030Shield Charge ^7+ ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 + ^x7070FFAssassin's Mark^7 + ^x70FF70Mark on Hit^7 (should be helmet since it should/will be Three Dragons) (Vaal) ^x70FF70Haste^7 + ^xE05030Divine Blessing^7 + ^xE05030Inspiration^7 + ^xE05030Increased Duration^7 (Gloves or Boots ar/ev) ^xE05030Determination^7 + ^xE05030Call to Arms^7 + ^xE05030Enduring Cry^7 + ^xE05030Infernal Cry ^7(Gloves or Boots ar/ev) ^x70FF70Grace^7 + ^xE05030Defiance Banner^7 + ^x70FF70Precision^7 (level 10-13 whatever mana allows you to do) ^xE05030Cast when Damage Taken ^7(Level 1) + ^xE05030Molten Shell ^7(Level 10) ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 or ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 (your prefference)
If you have more questions after this or something isn't working, please watch the guide, it should have most questions answered.
Spectres Step 1: Buy midnight bargain x 2 a neck with death attunement and void eye ring , level 20 spectre
Step 2: find a chump willing to desecrate spectres for you to raise (NOT ME DO NOT ASK ME I WILL BAN YOU FOR LIFE) use channel /global 6666
Step 3: raise Kitava herald , auric colossus , sandworn slaves, rattling condemed, auric champion Auric Champion: A3 Solaris, kill the statue without shattering/destroying corpse, raise the statue Auric Colossus: " Sandworn Slaves: Vasitri Desert, The Oasis Rattling Condemned: The Lower Prison, Shavronne's Tower Kitava Herald: The Cathedral Rooftop, I'm pretty sure the feeding trough/canal has it too
step 4: desecrate your own hideout and unequip all items
Coc Trigger rates
Cooldown Rate EffectiveCooldown AttackRate 0% 165 ms 6.06 14%+ 132 ms 7.57 52%+ 99 ms 10.10 128% 66 ms 15.15
^7--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Endgame Crafting (by Ruetoo)
Obtain Battered foil or you can use another base with a fracture with different numbers make sure you copy and paste the end weapon on that base into pob to look your trigger stats Spam loathing or zeal essence until you get both Crit and attack speed, you at at least t2 crit , and t2 attack speed in most cases copy and paste your weapon into pob to see if you can adjust attack speed to fix your trigger rates via jewels, tree, enchant. Multi mods fire damage and hits cant be evaded.
Get all res fracture Shield or fracture it yourself xdd Spam Life essence til fire dmg ( very hard ) lock prefix use veiled orb For the tanky version you need to lock prefixes and use reforge chaos til max chaos res ( 1/13?) so dont do this unless your rich you can also brick your shield and need to hit a 60/40 annul.
Helm Get fractured suffix with with life or suppression Spam chaos res essence til the other mod , use eldritch currency to do prefixes
Chest Get fractured suppress chest or another suffix if you dont mind crafting it or rolling it with eldritch Use dense fossils to try to get a high ES roll and do whatever
Gloves Get chaos res fracture and spam res essence or get spell suppression fracture and spam chaos essence Use eldritch currency
Boots Get whatever fracture spam some essence , either use eldrich currency for movement speed or life and craft other or use veiled orbs for MSBattered FoilBattered Foil
Get fractured res ring, spam anger essence til other res, lock prefix use vield orb
Belt
Get shaper Heavy or leather belt use str or res essence if you have strength on other pieces(ring gloves whatever) until you get t1 CDR (53 essence) if you have open suffix use suffix cannot change and reforge chaos Then lock suffix reforge life til decent life. I know belts are shit to craft especially with the removal of veiled chaos dont blame me.
other way is to
Get Chaos res fracture and spam armour essence (dread) til life roll and lock prefix and use veiled orbs have fun unveiling i think this is super expensive dont hate me hate crafting.
Jewels are fractured multi spam reforge life
Large Cluster If you want to craft them use elemental base not FIRE Use prismatic fossils it takes 99 of them so if you find one for cheaper just buy those. Alternatively you can just use Sadist and prismatic 2 mods and use extra points
